text: The 1986–87 Arizona Wildcats men's basketball team represented the University of Arizona during the 1986–87 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The head coach was Lute Olson. The team played its home games in the McKale Center in Tucson, Arizona, and was a member of the Pacific-10 Conference. The Wildcats finished with an overall record of 18–12 (13–5 Pac-10) and reached the NCAA Tournament, but lost in the opening round for the third consecutive year. ==Roster== ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=12 style=| Non- conference regular season |- !colspan=12 style=| Pac-10 regular season |- !colspan=12 style=| Pac-10 Tournament |- !colspan=12 style=| NCAA Tournament Sources ==Rankings== ==References== Arizona Category:Arizona Wildcats men's basketball seasons Arizona Arizona Wildcats men's basketball team Arizona Wildcats men's basketball team
